Bugzilla #44744:
Disable drawString(AttributedCharacterIterator, float, float) as it contains bugs and rely on the fallback implementation from AbstractGraphics2D.

author: bdelacretaz
msg: sling.js path adapted to path change of rev 643830

author: kahatlen
msg: DERBY-3116: totalSpace not properly initialized in AllocPage
- in AllocPage.createPage(), set borrowedSpace before
super.createPage() is called so that getMaxFreeSpace() returns the
correct value when totalSpace is initialized
- in CachedPage.setPageArray(), call usePageBuffer() also when the old
buffer is reused. This ensures that totalSpace is recalculated when
a page object is reused.

author: jeremias
msg: Bugzilla #44744:
Disable drawString(AttributedCharacterIterator, float, float) as it contains bugs and rely on the fallback implementation from AbstractGraphics2D.
